item.title: 印度预算案公布前投资者情绪缓和
对冲基金十多年来最大幅度削减日元空头押注
item.description: 在日本当局疑似采取双重市场干预措施以支撑日元汇率之后，对冲基金以惊人的方式减少了对日元的押注。【原文：Hedge funds pared bets against the yen in spectacular fashion after a suspected double-whammy market intervention from Japanese authorities to bolster the currency.】

item.title: South32 在氧化铝和镍减记 8.18 亿美元后暴跌
item.description: South32 Ltd. 周一股价大幅下跌，因为这家澳大利亚矿商报告了 8.18 亿美元的减值费用。【原文：South32 Ltd. shares fell sharply on Monday after the Australian miner reported $818 million of impairment charges.】

item.title: 渤海银行向中国不良贷款银行出售 35 亿美元贷款
item.description: 中国渤海银行股份有限公司（China Bohai Bank Co.【原文：China Bohai Bank Co. proposed to sell $3.5 billion worth of assets at a discount to bidders including the nation’s bad debt managers via a public tender to shore up capital levels.】

item.title: 意外降息后中国债券收益率测试中国人民银行干预区
item.description: 随着意外降息将收益率推低至可能的干预区域，中国债券交易员已开始测试央行的极限。【原文：China bond traders have begun to test the limits of the central bank as a surprise interest-rate cut pushed yields down into a possible intervention zone.】

item.title: 印度最大基金认为预算为中央银行提供了流动性工具
item.description: 印度最大的资产管理公司表示，印度的联邦预算应该为中央银行提供一个久经考验的工具，以应对印度加入一个重要的全球指数后可能出现的债券流动激增。【原文：India’s federal budget should arm the central bank with a time-tested tool to deal with a potential surge in bond flows on the nation’s entry into a key global index, according to the nation’s largest asset manager.】

item.title: 中国银行意外下调主要贷款利率
item.description: 继中国人民银行降息之后，中国各银行自 2023 年 8 月以来首次下调主要基准贷款利率，加大了对经济增长的支持力度。【原文：Chinese banks cut their main benchmark lending rate for the first time since August 2023, ramping up support for economic growth following the PBOC’s rate reduction.】

item.title: 中国矢志加快推进经济适用房新模式
item.description: 在创纪录的房地产萧条之后，中国执政党共产党承诺加快推行一种新的住房模式，即强调租赁和增加经济适用房。【原文：China’s ruling Communist Party pledged to accelerate a new housing model that emphasizes renting and ramps up affordable homes, following a record property slump.】

item.title: 中国央行下调关键短期利率提振经济
item.description: 中国人民银行近一年来首次下调了关键的短期政策利率，以加大对经济增长的支持力度，同时转向新的政策基准。【原文：The People’s Bank of China cut a key short-term policy rate for the first time in almost a year as it steps up support for growth while shifting toward a new policy benchmark.】

item.title: 铃木预计到 2047 年印度汽车市场将增长五倍
item.description: 铃木汽车公司（Suzuki Motor Corp.执行副总裁 Kenichi Ayukawa 表示。【原文：India’s car market is on track to reach 20 million units by 2047, helped by promising growth in battery electric vehicles, Suzuki Motor Corp. Executive Vice President Kenichi Ayukawa said.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 拜登退出选举习近平发布经济修复计划澳大利亚人正在动用房产现金来帮助养老。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：Biden pulls out of election. Xi unveils plan to fix the economy. Australians are tapping property cash to help fund retirement. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 拜登退出美国总统竞选，加密货币交易商看涨
item.description: 虽然比特币价格在美国总统乔-拜登决定不再竞选连任后短暂下跌，但加密货币交易商和粉丝们的情绪依然高涨。【原文：While Bitcoin prices briefly dipped in the immediate aftermath of US President Joe Biden’s decision not to run for re-election, the mood among crypto traders and fans has remained buoyant.】

item.title: 拜登退出大选，美国大选混乱升级，黄金攀升
item.description: 由于市场权衡了乔-拜登总统结束连任竞选的决定，黄金走高，这一决定引发了新的问题，即此举将帮助还是阻碍唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的机会。【原文：Gold edged higher as markets weighed President Joe Biden’s decision to end his reelection bid, which sparked fresh questions over whether the move will help or hinder Donald Trump’s chances of returning to the White House.】

item.title: Invesco 调查显示，主权财富基金转而看好新兴市场
item.description: 英伟达资产管理公司（Invesco Asset Management）的一项年度调查显示，管理着 22 万亿美元资产的主权财富基金和中央银行预计，新兴市场资产将从日益紧张的地缘政治局势中受益。【原文：Sovereign wealth funds and central banks that oversee $22 trillion in assets expect emerging-market assets to benefit from rising geopolitical tensions, an annual survey by Invesco Asset Management shows.】

item.title: 神秘债券买家以 90% 的折扣清偿中国开发商的债务
item.description: 资金来源成谜。但中国一家大型房地产开发商似乎正在尝试一种新颖的方法来解决债务问题：它正在与买家合作，以大幅折扣的价格购买债券，然后注销这些证券。【原文：The source of the money is shrouded in mystery. But a major Chinese real estate developer appears to be trying a novel approach to resolving its debt: it is working with a buyer to purchase bonds at deeply discounted prices, and then canceling the securities.】

item.title: 新加坡元有理由再次夺得亚洲货币桂冠
item.description: 新加坡元连续第三年成为亚洲表现最好的货币的可能性越来越大，因为新加坡中央银行看来将继续使用坚挺的汇率来对抗通货膨胀。【原文：The odds are growing for Singapore’s dollar to be Asia’s best-performing currency for a third straight year as the central bank looks set to keep using a firm exchange rate to combat inflation.】

item.title: 锂价回升遥遥无期，迫使矿商重新评估产量
item.description: 随着锂价格在三年低点附近徘徊，且没有任何回升迹象，人们开始关注矿商是否会被迫控制这种电池金属的供应。【原文：With lithium prices languishing near three-year lows and showing no signs a recovery is coming, attention is now turning to whether miners will be forced to rein in supply of the battery metal.】

item.title: 拜登退出美国竞选，油价上涨，加拿大油井面临大火威胁
item.description: 投资者权衡了乔-拜登总统决定不再寻求连任所带来的影响，同时加拿大的野火也威胁到了部分石油生产。【原文：Oil edged higher — after slumping almost 3% on Friday — as investors weighed the fallout from President Joe Biden’s decision not to seek reelection, while wildfires menaced some production in Canada.】

item.title: 拜登退出大选后美元走低：市场综述
item.description: 在乔-拜登结束竞选连任并支持副总统卡马拉-哈里斯之后，美元在亚洲早盘交易中下滑。该地区股市开盘涨跌不一。【原文：The dollar slipped in early Asian trading after Joe Biden ended his reelection campaign and endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris. The region’s stocks are set for a mixed start.】

item.title: 伍德赛德将以 9 亿美元收购美国液化天然气开发商 Tellurian
item.description: Woodside Energy Group Ltd. 已同意以约 9 亿美元的价格收购美国液化天然气出口项目开发商 Tellurian Inc.【原文：Woodside Energy Group Ltd. has agreed to buy US liquefied natural gas export project developer Tellurian Inc. for about $900 million.】

item.title: 拜登退选有可能颠覆大选赌局，美国期货收平
item.description: 美国期货开盘变化不大，交易员们在本周主要财报发布之前评估了乔-拜登总统决定不寻求连任对股市的影响。【原文：US futures opened little changed as traders assessed the stock-market implications of President Joe Biden’s decision to not seek reelection before a week loaded with major earnings releases.】

item.title: 台湾顶级科技基金称人工智能反弹仍有余力
item.description: 台湾一家业绩最好的科技基金预计，尽管人们越来越怀疑半导体行业的估值过高，但对人工智能的持续需求将推动半导体周期继续呈上升趋势。【原文：A top-performing Taiwan tech fund expects sustained demand for AI to keep driving an upward trend in the semiconductor cycle, despite growing doubts that valuations in the sector are too hot.】

item.title: 银行退出，高回报吸引富人投资煤炭基金
item.description: 澳大利亚的富裕阶层为了寻求有吸引力的投资回报，正在成为为因环境、社会和治理问题而被银行回避的煤炭项目融资的重要资金来源。【原文：Wealthy Australians, in search of attractive investment returns, are emerging as an important pool of capital for financing coal projects shunned by banks due to environmental, social and governance concerns.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 加拿大创纪录的枫糖浆丰收即将被全球市场挖掘。纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp. ）公布季度业绩后，黄金公司的盈利季将拉开帷幕。而欧洲最大的化学品生产国却萎靡不振。【原文：A record maple syrup bounty in Canada is ready to be tapped by global markets. Earnings season for gold companies kicks off when Newmont Corp. unveils its quarterly results. And Europe’s biggest chemicals producing nation is languishing.】

item.title: 最高法院推翻雪佛龙案对企业的启示
item.description:
此外，卡瓦的首席财务官还介绍了连锁餐厅的发展情况。【原文：

Plus, Cava’s CFO dishes on the restaurant chain’s growth.

】

item.title: 日本机场为何出现航空燃油短缺？快讯
item.description: 就在游客蜂拥而至，寻求享受历史上最廉价的日元时，日本的航空燃油短缺却阻碍了外国航空公司的发展，并有可能抑制旅游业的繁荣。燃料短缺促使政府采取行动，成立了一个跨部委和私营部门的特别工作组。【原文：A jet fuel shortage in Japan is hampering foreign airlines and threatening to curtail a tourism boom just as travelers are flocking to the country seeking to take advantage of a historically cheap yen. The scarcity of fuel has spurred the government into action, forming a task force across different ministries and the private sector.】

item.title: 投资者对拜登退出有何反应
item.description: 随着夏季的全面启动，市场已经有很多事情要处理，从评估美联储的降息路径到财报季的核心内容。但是，2024 年的总统竞选一直是市场关注的焦点。【原文：Markets already had plenty to deal with as summer kicks into full gear, from assessing the Federal Reserve’s rate-cut path to the heart of earnings season. But 2024’s presidential race keeps crowding into the headlines.】

item.title: 拜登退出让市场追问 "特朗普贸易 "下一步何去何从
item.description: 本周伊始，投资者们将争先恐后地判断，乔-拜登总统决定结束连任竞选活动并为副总统卡马拉-哈里斯背书，这是否会增加或减少唐纳德-特朗普重新掌权的机会。【原文：Investors are set to start the week scrambling to decide if President Joe Biden’s decision to end his reelection campaign and endorse Vice President Kamala Harris increases or decreases Donald Trump’s chances of regaining power.】

item.title: 更大的债务负担和反复无常的政治困扰着债券市场
item.description: 债券市场的震荡相隔两个星期、两个大洲。【原文：The bond-market tremors came two weeks and two continents apart.】

item.title: 秘密银行评级显示美国监管机构对处理风险的关注
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国一家重要的监管机构私下发现，在其监管的主要银行中，有一半对从网络攻击到员工失误等各种潜在风险的把握不足。【原文：A key US regulator has privately found half of the major banks it oversees have an inadequate grasp of a broad swath of potential risks from cyber attacks to employee blunders, according to people familiar with the matter.】
